  collapse = TRUE,

```{r, include = FALSE, message = FALSE}
options(
  warnPartialMatchArgs = FALSE,
  drake_clean_menu = FALSE,
  drake_make_menu = FALSE,
  htmltools.dir.version = FALSE
)
packages <- c(
  "targets",
  "keras",
  "recipes",
  "rsample",
  "tidyverse",
  "yardstick"
)
purrr::walk(
  packages,
  function(pkg) {
    suppressMessages(suppressWarnings(library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)))
  }
)
Sys.setenv(TAR_SCRIPT_ASK = "false")
tar_destroy()
```

## Long computation in R

<img src="./images/long-computation.png" height="300px">

.pull-left[
* Deep learning: `keras`, `tensorflow`, `torch`
* Machine learning: `tidymodels`
* Bayesian data analysis: JAGS, Stan, NIMBLE, `greta`
* PK/PD: `nlmixr`, `mrgsolve`
]

.pull-right[
* Clinical trial simulation: `rpact`, `Mediana`
* Statistical genomics
* Social network analysis
* Permutation tests
* Database queries: `DBI`
* ETL on large data
]
